Login.setNewPasswordDesc: You’ve logged in with a temporary password. Please create a new one you’ll remember.
Login.passwordResetDesc: Please contact your Admin team to generate a new password. Once you receive it, log in and create your own secure password.
Login.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
Login.passwordMust: Password must be at least 8 characters and include an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
Login.LogoutMsg: Are you sure you want to logout?
